TopicTitle: [I Think]The Jedi Space Program, Now On Twitter!

Articles.Content:
https://twitter.com/JediSpaceProgra

First, I would like to thank this guy for inspiring me to do this. I think it will add a lot to my canon. Plus, now it will be easier to bear the long, long wait in between updates to the main story, because Twitter is fast. I won't have an excuse to not post there!

I hope you enjoy the latest addition to the JSP continuity. If you have questions, comments or concerns, say so! And of course, feel free to join in on the fun--for the first time, you can now react and talk to the JSP like it were a real space program!
Ah, this explains it. I was curious as to how the account seemed to jump into things

Ah, this explains it. I was curious as to how the account seemed to jump into things

Thanks for inspiring me! Do you have any tips?

nothing more than I've already put into my original thread about how I'm doing things. Feel free to rip off what you want. I see you've already learned the folly of tweeting while you play. I covered that in my first post Elaborated in the others. Basically if you continue to do that you'll never be able to condense and get good pacing from your tweets, fill up your followers streams with a ton of tweets and they'll be like F this noise I mean, check out what @IAI_Space has been doing - even I got turned off a bit at the massive amounts of tweets he poured out
Bumping this, as it will be more active from now on.
